name: Vegan Cranberry Bliss Bars
description: These Starbucks copycat Vegan Cranberry Bliss Bars are deliciously dairy free, sweet, and soft. Imagine a festive white chocolate blondie topped with frosting, icing, and dried cranberries!
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon orange zest or 1/2 teaspoon orange extract
1/4 cup vegan butter, softened to room temperature
1 tablespoon soy milk, plus more as needed

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 9x13 inch baking pan with parchment paper, leaving overhang on the side so you can remove them easily.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 9x13 inch baking pan with parchment paper, leaving overhang on the side so you can remove them easily.

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, stir the melted vegan butter and brown sugar together until it resembles smooth caramel. Stir in the applesauce, vanilla and orange zest.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl, stir the melted vegan butter and brown sugar together until it resembles smooth caramel. Stir in the applesauce, vanilla and orange zest.

itemListElement.text: Now add the flour, baking powder and salt. Stir until just combined. The dough should be a bit thick and sticky.
itemListElement.name: Now add the flour, baking powder and salt. Stir until just combined. The dough should be a bit thick and sticky.

itemListElement.text: Fold in the white chocolate chips and dried cranberries.
itemListElement.name: Fold in the white chocolate chips and dried cranberries.

itemListElement.text: Transfer the mixture to the pan and press down evenly with your hands or a spatula. Bake for 15 minutes until the top is set and the top is golden. Do not over bake or they will dry out.
itemListElement.name: Transfer the mixture to the pan and press down evenly with your hands or a spatula. Bake for 15 minutes until the top is set and the top is golden. Do not over bake or they will dry out.

itemListElement.text: Allow the bars to cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then carefully use the parchment paper to lift them out and onto a cooling rack. Cool completely before frosting.
itemListElement.name: Allow the bars to cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then carefully use the parchment paper to lift them out and onto a cooling rack. Cool completely before frosting.

itemListElement.text: Cream cheese frosting: In a medium bowl, add the vegan cream cheese and softened vegan butter and beat with an electric mixer until creamy and smooth, about 2 minutes. Add the powdered sugar and vanilla and beat until smooth. Set aside.
itemListElement.name: Cream cheese frosting: In a medium bowl, add the vegan cream cheese and softened vegan butter and beat with an electric mixer until creamy and smooth, about 2 minutes. Add the powdered sugar and vanilla and beat until smooth. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Simple icing: Combine the powdered sugar, milk, vanilla and orange zest in a small bowl and whisk until smooth. You want a pourable glaze that is not too thin. If it seems thin, add a little more powered sugar. If it's too thick, add a bit more milk.
itemListElement.name: Simple icing: Combine the powdered sugar, milk, vanilla and orange zest in a small bowl and whisk until smooth. You want a pourable glaze that is not too thin. If it seems thin, add a little more powered sugar. If it's too thick, add a bit more milk.

itemListElement.text: Frost the cooled bars with frosting. Drizzle the icing on top of the frosting. Sprinkle the chopped dried cranberries on top.
itemListElement.name: Frost the cooled bars with frosting. Drizzle the icing on top of the frosting. Sprinkle the chopped dried cranberries on top.

itemListElement.text: Place the bars in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before slicing. This lets the frosting firm up so they slice neatly.
itemListElement.name: Place the bars in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before slicing. This lets the frosting firm up so they slice neatly.

itemListElement.text: Once chilled, slice into triangles, serve and enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Once chilled, slice into triangles, serve and enjoy!
